title: 088 - Cat Poop Christmas, Crappaw’s Tort-Emporium, and Gifts Galore
description:
This week, Levi’s brother Spencer salvages a plethora of cat poop for a Christmas gift. Freight is a gift party dictator. Jonnie joins the crew as the neighbor kid on Christmas morn. How old is Monty? Tim thinks Jonnie has a thumb head. Caleb receives a disappointing gift from a fan, whilst Freight is presented with the ULTIMATE benefaction (good word)!
  
 WE HAVE A FACEBOOK PAGE NOW! “Like” us @poddybreak!
